pr_title: Add option to copy chat message contents to clipboard

timeline.message:
Add option to copy chat message contents to clipboard

Signed-off-by: Tomas Slusny <slusnucky@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: This feels way too much like it should be an API function than an, admittedly documented, magic number-ridden line of code in some plugin.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: I don't think this should be API method as I don't think it will be useful outside of this plugin. It works just for getting chat message contents based on info from menu entry when menu is openened and nothing else.
replies.author: deathbeam
